captions.text:
In our lives these days, there
are so many things that are
trying to matter to us.

There are emails and phone calls
and advertisements and

all these things that
kind of barrage us.

But I feel like some of the
strongest, happiest moments

that I've ever felt in my life
are when I'm with my children,
when I'm with my family.

And it's when we come out and
do things like this, when we

get away from the world and
we're just together as a

family and we can relax and
laugh at each other.

And Mom says something crazy,
and that makes my brother
Casey say something to her.

As we grow up and we get older
and we all go our own ways and

we start living our own lives
and fulfilling our own dreams,

it's really good to come back
together and reconnect.

If we ever need anything, we're
always there for one
another

We talk to our family quite
often by telephone.

And they can say they're fine
and everything's great.

But you don't get a true feel of
how their life is going on
a five-minute telephone call.

But if you get together as a
family, you can see how their

family is together, how they
are reacting together.

And if they're happy, if they
have problems, we all talk
about it together.
We all work it out together.

Successful marriages and
families are established and

maintained on principles of
faith, love, compassion, work,

and wholesome recreational
activities.

title: Our Fun Family Vacation - The Importance of Spending Time With Family
